message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL 

The paper deals with a machine learning method for lifelong learning, specifically in the context of vision systems. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also uses autoencoders, which are a type of neural network, so cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is also a possible category. Finally, the paper evaluates its method on image classification tasks, which could fall under cs.CL (Computation and Language).
